data.title: What High-Tech Managers Need to Know About Brands
data.meta_description: Brands are not just names slapped on products by the marketing department; they embody the value those products have for your customers. That may be more true for high-tech products than it is for soap.
data.text:

LL

Larry Light is president of Arcature, a brand-strategy consulting company in Stamford, Connecticut.

JG

Jonathan Goldstine is program director for AIX strategy in the Server Group of IBM in Somers, New York.
